tweets.text:
#EUGreenWeek Day 3

You forgot to register to enjoy the full virtual experience?
No worries, you can any time and it takes 2 minutes!

This morning, join our 8 #EUBiodiversity sessions about protected areas, forests, invasive species, rivers, LIFE & more!

https://t.co/Az04LveyFh https://t.co/HiJlvJ0XMh

We're working with @BTP3Counties and @Glos_Police on a joint operation to investigate this illegal waste activity in #Gloucestershire. 

To report suspected illegal #waste activities call our hotline on 0800 807060 or @CrimestoppersUK on 0800 555 111.

#JointUnitForWasteCrime https://t.co/yOnBzr9z0H

There's still time to sign up for tomorrow's #WorldFishMigrationDay technical talk, all about #shad research and monitoring on the #riversevern with an overview of the @SevernUnlocked fish pass works too! 
#fish #conservationoptimism @fishmigration @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/U5MoISXBi1

Natural works of art, restored chalk rivers in Norfolk at dusk  also known as natural capital. Shares on offer at Norfolk Rivers Trust and @AquiferChalk @WildTroutTrust @WWF @theriverstrust @SalmonTroutCons @AnglianWater @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Let the sun shine on this asset https://t.co/mAyzWZNX8g

Officers joined forces with partner agencies last week to tackle metal & cable theft.

We work with regional forces, @NCA_UK @networkrail  @BT   @EnvAgency & power companies. 

More: https://t.co/pBdXQnIz3b

If you see something suspicious on the railway call 0800 504050. https://t.co/mghjcNYiU6

As part of National Metal and Waste Crime Week, officers from @DoverDC have taken part in an operation targeting metal waste crime.  

A joint venture with @kent_police's Rural Task Force, @EnvAgencySE and BT Open Reach security.

https://t.co/oGzkJAn7cb
Some autumnal rain - possibly heavy - forecast tomorrow and later in week. Are you prepared? https://t.co/FVHX2Z9uT5

The levels of incompetence within the upper reaches of the @EnvAgency have become simply breathtaking in its magnitude and ugliness.

Time for change. Time for ministers to act. Time to go. https://t.co/OzFAjZg3XX

See how our Damsels & Dragons project is going to improve the watercourse in Elmdon Park to make it flow more naturally and attract wildlife: https://t.co/QWLumVrpgk @ElmdonPark @SolihullCouncil @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency https://t.co/tuNf3Nuo19

Hatchford Brook re-naturalisation project in Elmdon Park progressing well. Concrete bed and sides removed. Gravels and cobbles added. Just spotted a kingfisher, x2 grey wagtails and a little egret  @Team4Nature @LoveSolihull @ElmdonPark @EnvAgencyMids @SolihullCouncil https://t.co/wXF7R2wkj9
Rob Martyr kicks off the keynote in his new role as Habitat Development Manager for WaterCare groups @KeepBritainTidy @stwater @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWestMidlands https://t.co/hiSvrahszY
@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency Local knowledge, inc mine, says the Graveney never floods here in London. We have had 3 flood warnings this year and I must now ignore your warnings....

The vehicle was found on premises at the New Dunn Business Park #Gloucestershire 

#JointUnitForWasteCrime #WasteCrime https://t.co/Q5Q4yet3zv

No harm should come to people and the environment from sites treating waste vehicles & scrap metal.

tweets.text: We hope everyone has enjoyed the Somerset Prepared Event today! Tomorrow, we have another exciting day of webinars and films. It's not too late to book!
